about_the_game:
Join a mysterious internet cult in a visual novel that plays out like a real conversation happening within a chat app.

FEATURES:

  • Scheme and manipulate by applying your own social enginering skills against a variety of vibrant internet personalities

  • Uncover the mystery of a murderous internet mafia working within shadows to take over the world

  • Find your own alternative ways of resolving conflicts and obtaining useful informaion

  • Advance your coercion skills by making choices that fit the current situation best

  • Date the Moderator

  • Clowns.
detailed_description:
Join a mysterious internet cult in a visual novel that plays out like a real conversation happening within a chat app.

FEATURES:

  • Scheme and manipulate by applying your own social enginering skills against a variety of vibrant internet personalities

  • Uncover the mystery of a murderous internet mafia working within shadows to take over the world

  • Find your own alternative ways of resolving conflicts and obtaining useful informaion

  • Advance your coercion skills by making choices that fit the current situation best

  • Date the Moderator

  • Clowns.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 (32-bit)
  • Processor: 1.0GHz dual-core processor with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware accelerated graphics with OpenGL support and 256 MB of dedicated memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard sound
  • Additional Notes: Fedora 24 and Debian 8 support
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz dual-core processor with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware accelerated graphics with OpenGL support and 512 MB of dedicated memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11 (El Capitan)
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9400M G
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 (Mojave)
  • Processor: 2.5GHz dual-core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Your mom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 (32-bit)
  • Processor: 1.0GHz dual-core processor with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware accelerated graphics with OpenGL support and 256 MB of dedicated memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz dual-core processor with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware accelerated graphics with OpenGL support and 512 MB of dedicated memory
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard sound

short_description: Join a mysterious internet cult in a visual novel that plays out like a real conversation happening within a chat app.
